data.actual_result: It places you so the content of the last message is at middle of the screen, so you need to scroll down through the tall image to actually jump to present
data.expected_result: You should be taken all the way at the bottom of the chat
data.short_description: If you're far back in the message history and the latest message in the channel has a tall image attached, jumping to present by tapping "You're viewing older messages" doesn't work properly
data.steps_to_repro: - Post a tall image in any channel - Scroll up until you get the "You're viewing older messages" - Jump back to present by tapping the banner
